channel.title: [pi] need help [pi]
channel.description:
well idk is this a model problem or my client or samthing else well i added chaotic weapons and they all bugged idk i addeed staff of light to and its perfect [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gsATS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lQ7tX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jLAme.png[/img]
Plz answer is it model problem :D

item.title: [pi] need help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

Okay i gonna try self change offset but here my code

case 15001: itemDef.name = "Chaotic maul"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 35088; itemDef.anInt165 = 35089; itemDef.anInt200 = 35089; itemDef.modelZoom = 1365; itemDef.modelRotationY = 498; itemDef.modelRotationX = 354; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1; itemDef.description = "A weapon of brute strength.".getBytes(); break; case 15003: itemDef.name = "Chaotic Rapier"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 35084; itemDef.anInt165 = 35085; itemDef.anInt200 = 35085; itemDef.modelZoom = 1400; itemDef.modelRotationY = 498; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1300; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1; itemDef.description = "A weapon of amazing speed.".getBytes(); break; case 15005: itemDef.name = "Chaotic longsword"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 35086; itemDef.anInt165 = 35087; itemDef.anInt200 = 35087; itemDef.modelZoom = 1400; itemDef.modelRotationY = 498; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1300; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1; itemDef.description = "A weapon of incredible accuracy.".getBytes(); break;

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] need help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

You’ve probably guesses it already, you added in the models incorrectly. They don’t have the correct settings. Post one of your model definitions on here.

Read full topic
